description: A citizen portal to collect and visualize real-time climate data from Nuremberg, focusing on heat distribution within the city.
goal: To make heat differences in a city quarter visible to everyone, raise awareness, and help find solutions for a more climate-friendly neighborhood.

dataSource.description: The application fetches sensor metadata and temperature readings from an external API.

keyFeatures: Heatmap layer to visualize temperature distribution.
Time slider to view historical data for the current day.
Statistics cards showing highest and lowest temperature, number of active sensors, and largest temperature difference.

funding.ministry: Bundesministerium für Wohnen, Stadtentwicklung und Bauwesen (BMWSB)
